sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"serverless-lift"}}>{`Serverless Lift`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"prequisites"}}>{`Prequisites`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`npm i -g serverless`}</MDXTag>{` to install the serverless framework.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Create a basic `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`up.yml`}</MDXTag>{` file:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-bash"}}>{`serverless:
  - express:
      name: hello-lift-express
      routes:
        - base
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Requirements from the base file of the app:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-bash"}}>{`#!/bin/bash
yarn init -y
kratos init
kratos store lift _lift
kratos store express-routes routes
kratos install lift serverless
lift up
shotgun run
touch .env
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`We should now be up and running! GET and POST reqs to / should be all you need to verify this.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"local-development"}}>{`Local development`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-bash"}}>{`ndb index.local.js
// or
node index.local.js
// or
nodemon index.local.js
// or best
ndb nodemon index.local.js
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"deployment"}}>{`Deployment`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-bash"}}>{`sls deploy
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"env-variables"}}>{`.env variables`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Put all .env variales in `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`serverless.env.yml`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
